content: a simple beanie made special by the use of noro yarn using just one 50g ball of noro kuryon or similar this beanie is both quick and easy to knit skill level advanced beginner the pattern is written in a line by line format skills needed are knitting in the round the knit stitch and knitting two stitches together finished sizes fits up 58cm head comfortably length 20 5cm now for the the boring bit with respect please do not take credit for the pattern claim the pattern as your own or sell the pattern selling completed hats is fine but not the pattern or any part of the pattern if you sell the hats online please link back to me for pattern credit by using this pattern you are agreeing to my terms thank-you and happy knitting
